---
title: Pre purchase of GCBF Tickets
date: 2014-06-11 00:00:00 Z
layout: post
category: Old
---

Paid members get a chance to pre purchase tickets for The Great Canadian Beer Festival held each year in Victoria BC. This year is no exception. Tickets are $40 each for each day and you can click on the link to pre order. Deadline is July 30/14 to get in on this pre sale<br /><a style="position: relative; font-size: inherit;" href="http://goo.gl/DgbciW" rel="nofollow nofollow" target="_blank">http://goo.gl/DgbciW</a><div style="margin-left: 2px; position: relative; display: inline; cursor: pointer; width: 16px; height: 16px; float: none; padding: 0px;"><a style="position: relative; display: inline; padding: 0px; margin: 0px; width: auto; background-image: none; border: 0px none;" target="_blank" href="https://www.siteadvisor.com/sites/http%3A//goo.gl/dgbciw%26h%3Dvaqe028zv%26s%3D1/-?pip=false&amp;premium=false&amp;client_uid=1970498794&amp;client_ver=3.6.6.129&amp;client_type=IEPlugin&amp;suite=true&amp;aff_id=876&amp;locale=en_ca&amp;ui=1&amp;os_ver=6.1.1.0" border="0"><img alt="" src="data:image/gif;base64&#44;" style="position: relative; display: inline; border: 0px none; margin: 0px; float: none; height: 16px; vertical-align: inherit; max-width: none; width: 16px;" /></a></div>
